course_description: Basic techniques of scenic painting in theater and film in step-by-step projects. The role of the scenic artist. How to communicate with a scenic designer. How to comment constructively on your own work and that of class mates.
sections: Class Nbr: 3889, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1-3:45p, Instructor: S. Culpepper, Status: Open
